text:
To prove my point:
<https://jsfiddle.net/qntyL5c7/2/>

That fiddle loads a simple form with 5 hidden fields that are set via a simple javascript loop in the `onFormReady` event. I log out the `event.data` values for each submission event (`beforeFormSubmit`, `onFormSubmit`, and `onFormSubmitted`) and you can see that the hidden fields even if set and submitted to the contact are not set in the callback data.
I submitted a support ticket - something is clearly not working as intended OR (the more likely outcome) is that HubSpot's documentation is not correct.
